modName: Tim the Enchanter Hat - alpha version male only
summary: My version of the horned hat worn by Tim the Enchanter in Monty Python and the Holy Grail.
descriptionHtml:
You can consider this an alpha version. I\'m just posting it to 1) get initial feedback, and 2) finally get something up on the Nexus. :) 

The hat has a three fold enchantment: it fortifies alchemy, destruction, and (of course) enchanting. 

Known issues:
1) Currently male only.
2) There is no weight slider support. Not sure why you would need it since its just a hat, but the underlying beggar hat asset has a _0 version and a _1 version, so IDK. We\'ll see. I may switch it out and use a different hat, the one without any holes in it.
3) No support for Argonians or Khajiit yet. You might not ever see this actually. I don\'t think it would look right.
4) The ground model is the college hood. I\'ll be fixing that once I\'m 100% happy with the basic biped models
5) Can only be obtained through the console. Type help \"enchanter\'s hat\" to find the ID.

Future plans: I\'m working on making Tim, an NPC follower/enchanting trainer, but before I release him, I\'ve got to make a custom beard, custom robes and necklaces, and write an appropriate quest and AI package.
author: Lumenbeing
